description: A TimeValuePair represents a value that is valid for a given point in time. For each TimeValuePair, only one of the value properties can be used mutually exclusive. Which value property has to be provided depends on the selected value type in the GenericTimeSeries feature, in which the TimeValuePair is included.

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: Specifies the timepoint at which the value of the TimeValuePair is valid.

properties.name: intValue
properties.description: Specifies the Integer value of the TimeValuePair.

properties.name: doubleValue
properties.description: Specifies the Double value of the TimeValuePair.

properties.name: stringValue
properties.description: Specifies the String value of the TimeValuePair.

properties.name: geometryValue
properties.description: Specifies the geometry value of the TimeValuePair.

properties.name: uriValue
properties.description: Specifies the URI value of the TimeValuePair.

properties.name: boolValue
properties.description: Specifies the Boolean value of the TimeValuePair.

properties.name: implicitGeometryValue
properties.description: Specifies the ImplicitGeometry value of the TimeValuePair.

properties.name: appearanceValue
properties.description: Specifies the Appearance value of the TimeValuePair.
